component.name: Chromium
component.summary: An officially supported, free and open source version of Chrome

description.p: Chromium is a feature-packed, lightning-fast browser brought to you by Google.

ul.li: Chrome Web Store allows you to add web apps to your desktop
Multiple profiles with isolated history, bookmarks, and data including Guest and Incognito for private browsing
Cutting-edge technology lets you browse faster and safer
